author: David Douglas and Dennis Romero
title: L.A. mandates masks for essential trips
description: Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti said Tuesday that those venturing out to grocery stores, pharmacies or food sellers would have to wear face coverings.
content:
Residents of the city of Los Angeles will have to wear face coverings if they venture out to grocery stores, pharmacies or other essential businesses allowed to serve the public amid a statewide stay-at-home order.
"Every Angeleno will share this responsibil… [+1227 chars]
